nist.model

Class Category

  • java.lang.Object
    • nist.model.Category

  • public class Category
extends Object
    Represents a Category in the NIST data feed. A category groups vulnerabilities (CVEs) based on shared characteristics. Each category contains multiple vulnerability entries and various metrics.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Carlos

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Category()
      Default constructor for creating an empty Category.
      Category(String ID, String summary)
      Constructs a Category with the specified ID and summary.
